Name: Polly's Special
Ingredients: 30 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
History: Adapted from a recipe in Victor Bergeron's 1947-72 Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide .
Nutrition: One serving of Polly's Special contains 238 calories
